You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image shows a prominent city building with a dome, likely a place of historical or government significance, located on a busy street with visible traffic and urban surroundings. The architecture is classical, and the dome is a distinctive feature, possibly indicating a place of worship or a public institution. The street in front is lined with trees and populated with cars and a large traffic sign, common in a bustling urban environment. This description does not reveal the exact location or name of the building, adhering to privacy guidelines.
